channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump threatens Chicago with apocalyptic force and Pritzker calls him a ‘wannabe dictator’
item.description: President Donald Trump is amplifying his promises to dispatch the National Guard to Chicago by posting a parody image from “Apocalypse Now” featuring a ball of flames as helicopters zoom overhead.

item.title: Chicago’s Mexican Independence Day celebrations shadowed by Trump’s threats for the city
Powerball draws numbers for $1.8 billion jackpot, the 2nd largest in US history
